name: Choir Manager
description:
Created for the Jamulator 2021, the Choir Manager is a game about managing a choir, where you'll need to mantain your singers' motivation in order to grow. Adjusting rehearsals, getting new songs and making concerts, you'll have to manage your resources to keep everyone happy while winning money. Good luck, have fun and thanks for playing!

Note: This is a prototype with a lot of tweaking to be done and some aspects to be added.

Music by EmoPreben (https://opengameart.org/content/simple-theme)
